excerpt: Dr. habil Susanne Elsen, Professor for Sociology and social development at the Free University of Bolzano. Studies in Social Work, Sociology, Economics and Educational Sciences. Director of the PhD-Program of the Faculty of Education. Her main topics of research are Social Innovation, Local Development and Community Economy, Sustainability and Post Growth Society.
